block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated 1B Will Clark from the 15-day disabled list. Sent INF Ryan Minor to Rochester of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed RHP Jaret Wright on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 12, and RHP Charles Nagy and LHP Ricardo Rincon on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 17. Signed RHP Scott Sanders. Recalled RHP Jim Brower from Buffalo of the International League. Purchased the contract of LHP Mark Watson from Buffalo. Released RHP Bobby Witt. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Dan Kolb from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned LHP Doug Davis to Oklahoma.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated 1B Will Clark from the 15-day disabled list. Sent INF Ryan Minor to Rochester of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed RHP Jaret Wright on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 12, and RHP Charles Nagy and LHP Ricardo Rincon on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 17. Signed RHP Scott Sanders. Recalled RHP Jim Brower from Buffalo of the International League. Purchased the contract of LHP Mark Watson from Buffalo. Released RHP Bobby Witt. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Dan Kolb from Oklahoma of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned LHP Doug Davis to Oklahoma.
National League METS--Activated RHP Bobby J. Jones from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Bill Pulsipher to Norfolk of International League.

National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Named JoJo White director of special projects and community relations representative. Women's National Basketball Association CHARLOTTE STING--Released G Jill Morton. MIAMI SOL--Waived F Octavia Blue, F Lesley Brown, G Nadine Domond, F Kenya Robinson, F Desma Thomas and C Nevirye Yilmaz. Added G Kim Williams to roster.

National Football League NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Named Lionel Vital national college scout. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Signed DT Delbert Cowsette to a three-year contract. Re-signed DE Ndukwe Kalu to a one-year contract. Waived LB Chris Ghidorzi.
USA Hockey USA HOCKEY--Named Mike Eaves U.S. National Development coach.

BROWN--Announced the retirement of Bob Rothenberg, director of track and field and cross country. Named Robert Johnson director of track and field and cross country. ST. FRANCIS, PA.--Announced the addition of women's lacrosse and women's field hockey as varsity sports, to begin competition in the 2001-02 season.
